Bash(python -c "
from src.todo_app.main import main
import sys
from io import StringIO

# Capture output to validate functionality
original_stdout = sys.stdout
sys.stdout = captured_output = StringIO\(\)

# Test basic functionality
from src.todo_app.storage import TodoStorage
from src.todo_app.cli import TodoCLI

storage = TodoStorage\(\)
cli = TodoCLI\(storage\)

# Test adding a task
result = cli.execute_command\(''add'', [''Buy groceries'', ''Milk, bread, eggs'']\)
print\(''Add result:'', result\)

# Test listing tasks
result = cli.execute_command\(''list'', []\)
print\(''List result:'', result\)

# Test completing a task
result = cli.execute_command\(''complete'', [''1'']\)
print\(''Complete result:'', result\)

# Test listing again to see the change
result = cli.execute_command\(''list'', []\)
print\(''List after complete:'', result\)

# Test updating a task
result = cli.execute_command\(''update'', [''1'', ''Buy food'', ''Milk, bread, eggs, cheese'']\)
print\(''Update result:'', result\)

# Test final list
result = cli.execute_command\(''list'', []\)
print\(''Final list:'', result\)

# Restore stdout and print captured output
sys.stdout = original_stdout
output = captured_output.getvalue\(\)
print\(''SUCCESS: Application is working correctly''\)
print\(''Sample output from commands:''\)
print\(output\)
")

Bash(python -c "
from src.todo_app.storage import TodoStorage
from src.todo_app.models import Task

# Test basic functionality
storage = TodoStorage\(\)

# Add a task
task = storage.add_task\(''Test task'', ''Test description''\)
print\(f''Added task: {task.id}, {task.title}, {task.description}, completed: {task.completed}''\)

# List tasks
tasks = storage.get_all_tasks\(\)
print\(f''Number of tasks: {len\(tasks\)}''\)

# Update task
updated_task = storage.update_task\(task.id, ''Updated task'', ''Updated description''\)
print\(f''Updated task: {updated_task.id}, {updated_task.title}, {updated_task.description}''\)

# Mark as complete
completed_task = storage.mark_task_complete\(task.id\)
print\(f''Marked complete: {completed_task.id}, completed: {completed_task.completed}''\)

# Mark as incomplete
incomplete_task = storage.mark_task_incomplete\(task.id\)
print\(f''Marked incomplete: {incomplete_task.id}, completed: {incomplete_task.completed}''\)

# Delete task
storage.delete_task\(task.id\)
print\(f''Deleted task. Number of tasks now: {len\(storage.get_all_tasks\(\)\)}''\)

print\(''SUCCESS: All core functionality working correctly''\)
")
